actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Committee on Ways and Means discharged in House.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Rereferred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with admendment, H. Rept. 94-593.
Measure called up by consent calendar in House.
Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Finance, S. Rept. 94-547.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 in order to provide for quarterly payment, rather than annual payment, to the Government of the Virgin Islands of amounts equal to internal revenue collections made with respect to articles produced in the Virgin Islands and transported to the United States.

summary.text: Provides for the quarterly payment, rather than annual payment presently required under the Internal Revenue Code, to the Government of the Virgin Islands of amounts equal to internal revenue collections made with respect to articles produced in the Virgin Islands and transported to the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 in order to provide for quarterly payment, rather than annual payment, to the Government of the Virgin Islands of amounts equal to internal revenue collections made with respect to articles produced in the Virgin Islands and transported to the United States.
